metadata.title: CVE-2018-16876 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
ansible before versions 2.5.14, 2.6.11, 2.7.5 is vulnerable to ainformation disclosure flaw in vvv+ mode with no_log on that can lead toleakage of sensible data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16876` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 2.5.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1').
